steps.name: When  Admin enters valid New Password "Sdet@123" and  Retype  "Sdet@123" and gets the result "<result>"
Then  Admin verify the message as "Your password has been reset.Please click here to login"

parameters.name: Success Message
parameters.value: Your password has been reset.Please click here to login
